field.name: summary
field.value: Nested ViewComponent In Section Renders Twice

field.name: description
field.value:
If you nest a viewcomponent inside of a section of another viewcomponet, and the nested viewcomponent has a "default" view. The default view is output twice.
component MyTemplateComponent : section RightColumn : component NavigationBar end end
Assuming NavigationBar has a view defined in Views\Components\NavigationBar\default.brail it will be output twice.
The first output will occur in the section where it should
The second output occurs after the MyTemplateComponent
